text:
Calipsa | Machine Learning Engineer | London | ONSITE

Calipsa is a VC backed startup in London that is building a platform to automate video based inspection tasks that require people to watch camera feeds (e.g. traffic surveillance, quality assurance in factories etc.)

We are hiring for 1. Machine Learning Engineers - Experience with CNNs, RNNs and the likes 2. Devops - Experience building distributed data processing pipelines (bonus for points for ML on video/ image content)
